ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Advice Sought
ygData.msgSnippet: At 24th I solo d the following areas: Rathe Mtn:  Skeletons Lakerathe:  Aviak Guards on 3spawn on island Oasis:  A orcs , DW Goblin pets, DW Croc/Caim Najena:
ygData.messageBody:
At 24th I solo'd the following areas:

Rathe Mtn: Skeletons
Lakerathe: Aviak Guards on 3spawn on island
Oasis: "A orcs", DW Goblin pets, DW Croc/Caim
Najena: TT's (there are 4)
Unrest: picked off train stragglers
Bugfallen
Cazic: Lizards from maze
S Karana: Elephants, some Centaurs, some Aviaks, some Gnolls (hard when it
rains)
W. Karana: Scythe beatles, some borers still give xp. Griffenes (bellow
kiting)
Highpass (orcs still give some xp)
Kithicor (corner near HP): 3 orc spawn. gave great xp till 25/26 (boring
though and dangerous at night)
GukTop: Scryer Room and sneak down to Warden to get elf hide gloves/troll
hide belt (CAREFUL!)

Lots of other places
----- Original Message -----
From: "roleplay" <roleplay@...>
To: "Bards" <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 22, 2000 6:38 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Advice Sought


> From: "roleplay" <roleplay@...>
>
> I am level 24 almost 25. Where can I solo for the next level ro 2 until
26/27?
>
> I have heard the Hermit or Gargoyles but I am not sure what levels they
are.
>
> Thank you.
>
> Ranian Aleroth.
> Bard of the 24th Song.
>
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
